tool_description: Detect face and return personal  information from Thai Passport
name: Passport OCR
title: Passport OCR

api_list.name: passport
api_list.description: Detect face and return personal  information from Thai Passport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passport-ocr1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ocr-passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passport-ocr1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://passport-ocr1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ocr-passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passport-ocr1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
